subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: SOUTH BEND, Ind., Oct. 13 (AP) — Matt Ryan passed for 291 yards and 2 touchdowns and Andre Callender scored three times as No. 4 Boston College beat Notre Dame, 27-14, on Saturday to remain undefeated.
snippet: SOUTH BEND, Ind., Oct. 13 (AP) — Matt Ryan passed for 291 yards and 2 touchdowns and Andre Callender scored three times as No. 4 Boston College beat Notre Dame, 27-14, on Saturday to remain undefeated.
